meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an area.
meanings.sent1: The areic landscape was filled with rolling hills and lush greenery.
meanings.sent2: The town's areic features included wide streets and spacious parks.
meanings.sent3: The areic design of the neighborhood made it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent4: Her areic personality shone through in her love for exploring new places.
meanings.sent5: The areic scenery painted a vivid picture of the local environment.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the open air.
meanings.sent1: The areic breeze felt refreshing on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: Camping under the stars allowed us to experience the areic beauty of nature.
meanings.sent3: The areic atmosphere at the outdoor concert was invigorating.
meanings.sent4: His areic spirit thrived in the freedom of the great outdoors.
meanings.sent5: The areic wind carried the scent of pine trees through the forest.
